name: Gun Mountain
description:
Climb the great Gun Mountain, with a gun of course!

You are Rob.
Rob's friends have challenged Rob to climb Gun Mountain.
Rob accepts the challenge, but Rob likes to do stuff unconventionally.
Rob has decided that he will climb the mountain with a gun.

Made in 72 hours for the second MashUp Game Jam with the theme "UNCONVENTIONAL MEANS"
https://itch.io/jam/mashup-game-jam-2

The game fits the theme by having you use a gun to climb a mountain which is pretty unconventional if you ask me.

All the code, art and sound was made by me (RCJ15) during the jam period.
